about_the_game:
Welcome to Childkin, the ultimate life simulation game that blends the creative freedom of The Sims with the charming social vibe of Animal Crossing. Immerse yourself in a warm, relaxing world where meaningful relationships, creative expression, and wholesome adventures await.

Whether you're decorating your dream room, forming friendships with lovable characters, or exploring a vibrant, evolving world — Childkin offers a cozy, heartwarming escape.

🌟 Key Features for a Wholesome Gaming Experience:

🏠 Decorate and Personalize Your Space Design the perfect cozy room with endless customization options, from charming furniture to delightful decor styles.

🤝 Build Strong Relationships Meet and connect with unique characters who have their own personalities, backstories, and surprises. Strengthen bonds through thoughtful interactions and shared experiences.

🎨 Shape a Community and World Join seasonal events and participate in world-building moments driven by your choices and creativity.

🌅 Relax and Unwind in a Picturesque World Take a step back from the hustle and bustle. Enjoy a peaceful environment filled with gentle music, soft visuals, and cozy vibes.

🔎 Discover Secrets and Stories Explore hidden paths, uncover delightful secrets, and unlock unique events as you grow in this wholesome world.

Who Is Childkin For?

  • Fans of cozy games like The Sims, Animal Crossing, and Stardew Valley

  • Players who love decorating, building meaningful relationships, and exploring vibrant worlds

  • Gamers looking for a wholesome, stress-free escape

Why Wishlist Childkin?

🔔 Wishlisting ensures you stay up to date on the game's development and its launch date. Be the first to explore new updates, special events, and exclusive content.

Ready to dive into a cozy life simulation full of creativity, connection, and heartwarming adventures?

💖 Wishlist now and join the cozy community!

name: Childkin: Tiny Adventures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 650
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 7
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 780

short_description: Welcome to Childkin, the ultimate life simulation game that blends the creative freedom of The Sims with the charming social vibe of Animal Crossing. Immerse yourself in a warm, relaxing world where meaningful relationships, creative expression, and wholesome adventures await.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Czech*, Danish*, Finnish*, Greek*, Spanish - Latin America*, Dutch*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Romanian*, Swedish*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Hungarian*
*languages with full audio support
